scripts.build:libs: ng build sag-libs && cd dist/sag-libs && npm pack

scripts.build:sag-libs: ng build sag-libs && cd dist/sag-libs && npm pack
scripts.build:auth: ng build sag-auth && cd dist/sag-auth && npm pack
